member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect
member.summary: Lighting effect creates an image that appears to be a reflective surface where the light source is limited to a directed cone of light. This effect uses the alpha channel as a height map, and lights it with a point light source applying the specular portion of the Phong lighting model.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Spot-specular lighting effect.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SpotSpecularEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.SpecularExponent
member.summary: Specular power for the Phong lighting model. Larger values produce more sharply defined highlights. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.SpecularAmount
member.summary: Intensity of the specular light. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for SpotSpecular effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.LimitingConeAngle
member.summary: Angle (in radians) that restricts the region where light is projected. No light is projected outside the cone. Default value pi/2.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.LightTarget
member.summary: Target that the spot light is pointing at. Default value (0,0,0).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.LightPosition
member.summary: Position of the light source. Default value (0,0,0).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.LightColor
member.summary: Color of the incoming light. Default value white.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.HeightMapScale
member.summary: Height map scale factor in the Z direction. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.HeightMapKernelSize
member.summary: Size of the Sobel filter kernel used to convert the input heightmap to surface normal vectors. Default value (1,1).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.HeightMapInterpolationMode
member.summary: Interpolation mode used to filter the height map. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotSpecularEffect.Focus
member.summary: Focus of the spot light. Default value 1.

member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1SpotSpecular GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.
